metadata.synopsis: Wulbren has asked the player for tools, player has thrown something he can use through the bars.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load act 2, teleport to Wulbren (he's in the prison in Moonrise). Speak to wulbren and persuade him you're here to help - he'll ask you to get 'tools'. Spawn an item like a hammer or mace and throw it to him through the bars.

0.speaker: Wulbren Bongle
0.context: NodeContext: Assured - player has done has wulbren asked (because why would they do anything else?)
